title: "Jarosh" connected script
content:
I need some help identifying this script.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121141321im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/38403.gif)

 [‹ "Misguided Angel" cursive font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121141321/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5283 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) 50's style connected script - various {gang} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121141321/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5279 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pmiura

comments.content: I think it's hand-drawn. The ligatures are too smooth. Also, the strokes are even, except the J which has a variable stroke width.
